channel.title: Marketing Car Blog
channel.description: Expert small business marketing solutions that drive real results. From digital strategy to lead generation, we help small businesses grow with proven marketing systems.

item.title: 5 Small Business Marketing Hacks That Don’t Require Selling a Kidney
item.description: Small business marketing doesn’t have to feel like driving a 1989 sedan with three missing hubcaps and an “I brake for squirrels” bumper sticker.
item.author: noreply@marketingcar.com (Marketing Car)

item.title: Five Small Business Marketing Tips That Won’t Make You Cry
item.description: Running a small business can feel like juggling chainsaws while smiling at customers.
item.author: noreply@marketingcar.com (Marketing Car)

item.title: Small Business Marketing Can Be a Lot Like a Bad First Date
item.description: A funny but practical look at the habits that make customers ghost you and how to fix them.
item.author: noreply@marketingcar.com (Marketing Car)

item.title: Stop Spinning Your Wheels: Why Most Marketing Is Terrible (and How to Fix It)
item.description: Let’s face it: most small business marketing feels like driving with the emergency brake on.
item.author: noreply@marketingcar.com (Marketing Car)

item.title: Your Marketing Isn’t Broken. Your GPS Is Lying.
item.description: Every week, someone shows up in our inbox thinking they need a new engine. Their leads dried up. Their calendar’s empty. Their ads flopped. Their website traffic tanked. So they assume they need a total rebuild.
item.author: noreply@marketingcar.com (Marketing Car)

item.title: You Don’t Need a Faster Car. You Need a Better Map.
item.description: Let’s be honest—most businesses aren’t stuck because their engines are weak. They’re stuck because they’re driving in circles without a plan.
item.author: noreply@marketingcar.com (Marketing Car)
